response.content:
Here's a recipe for a delicious chocolate cake for 8 people:

```
{
  "step1": "Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease two 8-inch round cake pans and line bottoms with parchment paper. Prepare pans for baking.",
  "step2": "Mix 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, and 1 teaspoon salt in a medium bowl. Whisk dry ingredients.",
  "step3": "Combine 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, and 2 large eggs in a large bowl. Beat with an electric mixer until smooth.",
  "step4": "Add dry ingredients to chocolate mixture, alternating with 1 cup whole milk. Beat until just combined, being careful not to overmix batter.",
  "step5": "Divide batter evenly between prepared pans. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Let cool.",
  "step6": "Once cool, frost with your favorite chocolate frosting and decorate as desired. Serve and enjoy your delicious homemade chocolate cake!"
}
```
